fullText: The musical, with music by Barry Manilow and book and lyrics by Bruce Sussman, tells the story of the Comedian Harmonists, a sextet that was hugely popular in Germany until the rise of the Nazis.
dtliExcerpt: The musical, with music by Barry Manilow and book and lyrics by Bruce Sussman, tells the story of the Comedian Harmonists, a sextet that was hugely popular in Germany until the rise of the Nazis.
